name: Path M NET Colon
title: Pathologic M
rows:
Distant lymph node(s):
For all colon sites:
        Common iliac
        Distant lymph node(s), NOS
        External iliac
        Para-aortic
        Retroperitoneal
 For cecum, ascending colon, hepatic flexure, and transverse colon (C180, C182-C184):
        Inferior mesenteric
        Superior mesentric lymph nodes only
For splenic flexure, descending colon, and sigmoid colon (C185-C187):
        Superior mesenteric

Distant metastasis, NOS

Carcinomatosis

Distant metastasis WITH or WITHOUT distant lymph node(s) 

Distant metastasis, NOS

Stated as M1

Pathologic M is not defined for this site/histology
In situ (no Tis defined)

There is no evidence of metastatic disease (cM0)
There is no pathologic workup for metastatic disease
Negative biopsy of a distant site
Clinical evidence of metastatic disease (clinical M1) but not histologically proven
